content:
We share an invitation to a demonstration

<The image of this location is in the list above, but in order to protect the site's traffic costs, it cannot be displayed here, sorry.>

8.3. celebrate International Women's Day on a traditional march in the center of Tampere.

The march route runs in front of Tullintori (Tullikamari Square) to the Central Market and the march starts organizing at 6:00 pm.

More information about the event, speakers and participating organizations, groups, parties and professional departments, and associations will soon be updated on this event page very soon.

If you are interested in keeping a speech or greeting or forming a block on the march, please contact: naismarssi@gmail.com

Welcome aboard!

Demonstration Facebook event: https://www.facebook.com/events/607706331517320
title: TRE: Demonstration on International Women's Day
author: mats
